rows.label: tlk70000035_01_msg0001
rows.name: Most materials can just be gathered...

rows.label: tlk70000035_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But there are some things you can
only get by defeating monsters.

rows.label: tlk70000035_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A handyman I met at a restaurant told
me that. Apparently he has a hard time
getting some stuff he needs for work.

rows.label: tlk70000035_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I commiserated with him and told
him how hard it was to deal with
Leo sometimes... He was a nice guy.
